item.title: Officer killed in CDC shooting was a former Marine and father of 2
item.description: David Rose, a 33-year-old DeKalb County police officer, was killed on Aug. 8 while responding to a shooting on Emory University’s Atlanta campus.

item.title: Victor Woods on self-esteem: “Whether in schools or prisons, it’s necessary for young people”
Jaguars’ Cam Little hits a 70-yard field goal in exhibition game against Steelers
item.description: The ball cleared the crossbar by several yards — far enough that the ball boy caught it in the air.

item.title: FHP: Two teens killed, two hospitalized after Manatee County crash
item.description: The crash killed the driver and a 19-year-old man from Parrish.

item.title: Investigation underway after dead baby girl found inside hearse at funeral home, police say
item.description: A dead baby girl was found inside a hearse at a funeral home in Alabama, according to authorities.

item.title: New alert system coming to Bradenton Beach
item.description: Perhaps the most important feature about this new system? They won’t over-notify you.

item.title: ‘He’s my hero’: Veteran credits service dog with saving his life – literally
item.description: The veteran, who lives with PTSD, says service dogs are the answer for veteran and first responders struggling with mental health issues.

item.title: Mother says 16-year-old daughter’s bullies left mutilated sex doll in their driveway
item.description: The sheriff says authorities have been investigating since the “vulgar” and “disturbing” items were left on the family’s property.

item.title: Beach & Boating Forecast Sunday
item.description: Coastal roads could experience ponding or flooding during afternoon storms.

item.title: Body found in pond along I-75 believed to be missing Giovanni Pelletier, sheriff said
item.description: The sheriff's office says a decomposing body was found in a retention pond near I-75 and State Road 70.

item.title: Farmer’s Market Sunday Forecast
item.description: An isolated shower is possible in the morning, with widespread thunderstorms developing for the afternoon and evening hours

item.title: Thunderstorm chances still high Sunday
item.description: Scattered showers is possible in the morning, with widespread thunderstorms possible for the afternoon
